summary: Finally, not only iPad but also iPhone is supported. Now you can create GPX file without PC.

feature.title: What is this application？
featureList: You can create the route that you are going to or have gone, easily.
Only tap action, the route can be drawn.
You can check the route profile, as well
The pacenotes of the route is generated automatically.
Created route can be exported to a cloud storage(iCloudDrive, Dropbox and so on). Of course, you can import from a cloud.
GPX file, now only export is available.

operation.title: Operation
opeList: Change the drawing mode first. It changes hand, route and line order.
Tap on the map。The start flag is shown
Tap next point。A route is drawn along the road.
Touch a Gray area around a via point, and you can change information. Trash icon, you can delete the point as well.
Long tap and drag, you can move a point.
Wrong tap makes sometimes unexpected route. Just tap undo. Redo is also available.
Export to a cloud drive and import from it. GPX, now only export is available.
Search icon, you can find intersection names in Japan. Rotation icon, toggle rotation enable and disable of the map. Current location icon, pan the map to your location.

graph.title: Elevation
descList: The elevation graph of the route is drawn.
You can check the route distance, highest point, lowest point and total elevation.

cuesheet.title: Pacenotes
descList: Pacenotes is automatically generated, at the start, turn point(round icon on the map), check point and goal.
Distance from last point and total distance are shown.
It is shown that the road name or number you are going to next.
Also you can check a altitude of the point.
Point comment is shown. Touch here, and you can edit it.
If the point have a intersection name, it is shown.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Please check FAQ first, when you get trouble or you can't understand something.

contact.title: Contact form
contact.description: If you could't resolve the problem after reading FAQ, please contact us.
